title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Vision to Value: Scaling Gen AI with Speed to Reduce TCO with AWS (COP215)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从愿景到价值：通过AWS快速扩展生成式AI以降低总拥有成本 (COP215)
abstract: Enterprises across industries are exploring Generative AI to drive operational efficiency while simultaneously reducing total cost of ownership (TCO). Tech Mahindra and AWS have partnered to deliver scalable, production-grade GenAI solutions that help organizations modernize workflows, automate decision-making, and optimize cost structures. This session highlights how the combined strengths of AWS’s AI ecosystem and Tech Mahindra’s domain expertise are enabling measurable business transformation. This presentation is brought to you by Tech Mahindra, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 各行业的企业正在探索生成式AI，以提高运营效率，同时降低总拥有成本（TCO）。Tech Mahindra与AWS合作，提供可扩展的生产级GenAI解决方案，帮助组织实现工作流现代化、自动化决策制定并优化成本结构。本次会议重点介绍AWS的AI生态系统与Tech Mahindra的领域专业知识如何共同推动可衡量的业务转型。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Tech Mahindra提供。
